name: Aeitia's Pinball (Spring Spring)
description:
An old pinball game from 2017 that really is quite challenging, and you will probably lose often.  It has a funny seafood theme, which was based on an even older game I made back in 2014, called Poissonier.

🦞Controls🦞

Enter starts the game, space pulls the plunger, A and S operate the flippers, and left and right arrows tilt the table. This is one of the few games I have where changeable controls have unfortunately not been added.
